info.title: SeaX Bulk SMS
info.description:
- [Overview](#section/Overview)
- [Quick Start](#section/Quick-Start)
- [Authorization](#section/Authorization)
- [Features](#section/Features)

## Overview
SeaX Bulk SMS helps you manage communication with customers through SMS/MMS.

### Send
1. Send Bulk SMS/MMS
2. Schedule send up to 7 days in advance
2. Respect "Do Not Contact"
3. View the Delivery Report
4. Send from multiple numbers

### Receive
1. Capture auto opt-in and opt-out
2. Receive customer replies and text back

### Contact Management
1. Import/export contact list
2. Assign multiple labels to contact
3. Group contacts by the label to Bulk Send

## Quick Start
### Sending a campaign
#### 1. Follow the steps in [Authorization](#section/Authorization) to generate APIKey to authorize your request

#### 2. Import contacts
1. [Import contacts](#tag/contact/operation/import_contacts_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__import_contacts_post).
2. [Get job status](#tag/jobs/operation/get_job_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__jobs__job_id__get) by job_id from previous step. If the status of the `job` is `finished` or `failed`, it means the progress of importing contacts is over.

#### 3. Launch campaign
1. [Send a campaign](#tag/campaigns/operation/create_campaign_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__campaigns_post).
2. [Get job status](#tag/jobs/operation/get_job_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__jobs__job_id__get) by job_id from previous step.
If the status of the `job` is `finished` or `failed`, it means the progress of the campaign is over.
3. [Check the result of campaign](#tag/campaigns/operation/list_campaign_logs_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__campaigns__campaign_id__logs_get).

### Sending an SMS/MMS
#### 1. [Get the id of the sender phone.](#tag/phones/operation/get_phones_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__phones_get)
#### 2. [Send an SMS/MMS from the sender's phone with its id to the contact phone.](#tag/messages/operation/send_message_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__send_message_post)

### Contact Management
#### 1. Create contacts with RESTful APIs
1. [Create contact labels.](#tag/contact_label/operation/create_contact_label_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__contact_labels_post)
2. [Create contacts with contact labels.](#tag/contact/operation/create_contact_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__contacts_post)

#### 2. Create contacts by importing CSV
1. [Import contacts](#tag/contact/operation/import_contacts_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__import_contacts_post).
2. [Get job status](#tag/jobs/operation/get_job_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__jobs__job_id__get) by job_id from previous step. If the status of the `job` is `finished` or `failed`, it means the progress of importing contacts is over.


## Authorization
### Access token and refresh token
The `access token` is for authorization and the `refresh token` is to get a new `access token` when the old one is expired. The detailed description is here https://seaauth.seasalt.ai/redoc.
1. [Login into SeaAuth](https://seaauth.seasalt.ai/redoc#tag/users/operation/login_api_v1_users_login_post) with scope `seax-bulk-sms`. The scope value would authorize the access token to use the endpoint of SeaX Bulk SMS.
2. Add `access token` to the header `Authorization` with the `Bearer` prefix, for example, `Authorization`:`Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1...`.

### API Key
Because the `access token` has a limit lifetime, it is inconvenient for backend integration to refresh after expiration. There is an `API Key` that would not expire until you refresh it. Here is how you can get a
`API Key`.
1. [Create API Key](#tag/api_keys/operation/reset_api_key_api_v1_workspace__workspace_id__api_keys_reset_post).
2. Add APIKey to the header `X-API-Key`.

<!-- ## Features
### Auto reply with Keyword
#### What is the keyword?
When an inbound message from the contact is sent to your phone, the keyword would try to match the message and do the following two things:
1. Automatically respond to the contact of an inbound message with a defined reply message.
2. Add the defined labels to the contact of the inbound message.

#### How do keywords work?
The matching process works as below:
1. Match the message with system DNC words `stop`, `unsubscribe`, `remove me`, `stop sending me messages`, `wrong person`, and `wrong number`. If it matched, Add the system
label `DNC` to the contact and reply to the contact with `dnc_reply_message` if the `enabled_dnc_reply` of your phone is `True`.
2. If no match in Step 1. Match the message with the keywords associated with your phone in order of priority. When it matches, there is fine-grained control of automatic reply and adding a label with `enabled_auto_reply` and `enabled_contact_label`.
3. If no match in Step 2. Reply to the contact with `generic_reply_message` if the `enabled_generic_reply` of your phone is `True`. -->
